quote: The president, just as any other American, deserves a legal defense against personal lawsuits not related to his office. But the costs of that defense should be borne by him and not the taxpayer.
quote_letters: THE PRESIDENT JUST AS ANY OTHER AMERICAN DESERVES A LEGAL DEFENSE AGAINST PERSONAL LAWSUITS NOT RELATED TO HIS OFFICE BUT THE COSTS OF THAT DEFENSE SHOULD BE BORNE BY HIM AND NOT THE TAXPAYER
